channel.title: Got a Problem with a Blank Source
channel.description:
So.. I have decided to start completely new, with a blank source. So far, the home is great, and added a few NPCs.
But...
I want too add a Scimitar shop near the NPCs so that players can buy, as they advance levels. But when I use the Shopmaker, I look in client.java and I don't have a "Wannashop = 2" And I have no clue how I would start one without messing up the server.
If anyone has ideas, that would be great. Thanks! :rolleyes:

item.title: Got a Problem with a Blank Source

item.description:

RS2 section is this way => http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php#19

item.title: Got a Problem with a Blank Source
item.dc:creator: @IconsOfEvil IconsOfEvil
item.description:
@IconsOfEvil wrote:

So… I have decided to start completely new, with a blank source.
So far, the home is great, and added a few NPCs.

But…

I want too add a Scimitar shop near the NPCs so that players can buy, as they advance levels.
But when I use the Shopmaker, I look in client.java and I don’t have a “Wannashop = 2”
And I have no clue how I would start one without messing up the server.

If anyone has ideas, that would be great.
Thanks! :rolleyes:
